ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: And He does not fear the consequences.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: He does not fear the consequence.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: He has no fear of its sequel.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: God is not afraid of the result of what He had decreed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And He does not fear its coming behind (to take vengeance).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And He feared not the consequences thereof.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And He fears not its consequence.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and He fears not the issue thereof.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: He dreadeth not the sequel (of events).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: He did not fear the consequences.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And He feared not the consequence thereof
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: And He does not fear its outcome.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And for Him is no fear of its consequences.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And He (Allah) feared not the consequences thereof.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: He does not fear the result (of their destruction).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And He does not fear its sequel.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And He does not fear the consequence thereof.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [91:15] And He does not (read wa-lā, or fa-lā) fear the consequence of it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (He dreadeth not the sequel (of events)) and it is also said this means: and He dreads not the one who instigated it'. And of the surah in which the Night is mentioned, which is all Meccan and consists of 21 verses, 71 words and 320 letters: Surah 92: Night (al-Layl) And of the surah in which the Night is mentioned, which is all Meccan and consists of 21 verses, 71 words and 320 letters:
